meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>fist</kanji> <kanji>gun</kanji> is a small fistish sized gun that has some punch (because, you know, fist!). The gun I'm describing is a <vocabulary>revolver</vocabulary>, or a <vocabulary>handgun</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
